body.name: ECO ROOTS Natural Deodorant for Women & Men | Organic Deodorant Cream Non Aluminum | Baking Soda Free Healthy Deoderant for Body & Private Parts | All Vegan Pit Paste Zero Sweat | Coconut Scent

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 12 mins
features: ? Natural Deodorant Cream - Eco Roots deodorant cream effectively works to neutralize underarm, body & private parts odor and absorbs wetness. Created with nourishing ingredients, it soothes your skin.

💧 Avoid Irritation - Made with Arrowroot Powder, Coconut Oil and Unrefined Shea Butter. This natural deodorant for women is Baking Soda Free. With a pH above 7, baking soda creates dryness and irritation in contact with normal skin with a pH of around 5

🍀 Rich in vitamins A, D, E, and F - All natural deodorant for women has all the exceptional properties your skin needs thanks to Shea Butter. Vitamin A acts as an antioxidant, vitamin D brings a dose of sun, vitamin E helps fight against aging & vitamin F restores suppleness and elasticity to any lady parts skin

💯 Organic Ingredients - Your Cream Deodorant it has Zero Aluminum, Sulfates, and Phthalates. Say goodbye to chemical ingredients and stay fresh with our healthy natural deoderant that is also 100% Vegan
✔️ How to use it - Apply a pea size amount onto clean and dry underarm, body or private parts. Use your fingertips and gently rub until absorbed. For zero sweat protection, reapply when needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hi, we are EcoRoots! About EcoRoots Welcome to EcoRoots, where we are committed to offering the finest products designed for a better future. Our products are thoughtfully crafted for every individual, respecting diverse needs and identities. Whether it's beauty, health, or household essentials, our collection aims to provide sustainable choices that reduce waste and promote responsible consumption. We invite you to be a part of our community, united in creating a positive impact for a greener and more sustainable world. Join us on this journey!

Beneficial for you and kind to the planet! Vegan & Organic Ingredients Made in small batches with vegan and organic ingredients you can actually read! Our natural deodorant cream effectively work to neutralize underarm odor and absorbs wetness without the use of aluminum or other harmful chemicals. A Natural Deodorant That Actually Works! Made with only 7 ingredients, our natural deodorant cream is vegan, effective, and clean alternative to disposable and toxic deodorant. Formulated with arrowroot powder, coconut oil, and unrefined shea butter, our deodorant cream is easy to apply and has a light creamy texture. Zero-Waste & Plastic-Free Package Minimize your environmental footprint - beneficial for your well-being, gentle on the planet! Our natural deodorant cream is thoughtfully packaged in a glass jar with a metal lid that can be recycled. Unlike plastic jars, we utilize sustainable packaging that is easily reusable or recyclable, contributing to the reduction of plastic waste. Cruelty-Free & Handmade in the USA Our formula is baking soda and aluminum free and is handcrafted in small batches in Arizona using gentle ingredients that effectively battle odor, while keeping your pits soft, dry, and rash-free. Always silicone-free, sulfate-free, paraben-free, gluten-free, and never tested on animals.
Handmade In Small Batches in the USA Vegan & Cruelty-Free Made with Organic Ingredients Baking-Soda Free & Aluminum-Free Reusable Package
How To Use Our Deodorant Cream?

Embrace products that are better for both you and the planet! Experience the benefits of our thoughtfully curated blend of natural and organic ingredients that will keep you feeling fresh and confident throughout the day. Our deodorant cream effectively neutralizes odor without compromising on sustainability, as it is packaged in a glass jar with a recyclable metal lid. Simplicity is at the heart of our philosophy, reflected in our aluminum-free and baking-soda-free formula that is gentle on the skin. We've carefully selected nourishing jojoba oil, arrowroot powder, moisturizing coconut oil, and hydrating unrefined shea butter to create a product that promotes healthy underarms. Take the plunge and try our deodorant cream today to harness the power of nature's finest ingredients. Your underarms will undoubtedly thank you for the natural care and attention!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREATEST PRODUCT EVER!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many natural options and nothing ever works and they tend to leave me with rashes and major irritation. This stuff is amazing, it doesn't leave streaks on my clothes. It's goes on easy. I have yet to stink AT ALL, even over night since I've started using this and I have had zero irritation or discoloration.I'm a relatively sweaty person and I tend to need to reapply deodorant twice during the day but with this it's once in the morning and I'm good all day long.Not a whole lot of scent behind it but I don't mind that, it's nice enough and as long as I don't stink I'm a happy camper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have spent so much money and uncomfortable days trying to find a deodorant that doesn't give me 3rd degree burns and I don't smell to high heaven by the end of the day without reapplying. Finally I have found the best deodorant! Please Eco Roots , don't change a thing. Both me and my daughter have had issues with finding a deodorant that works. Of course all "natural deodorants are expensive, but I would have no issue if they actually worked. We tried Lume for a good while but I stunk by the end of the day unless I reapplied. This deodorant cream has little scent but I don't smell throughout the day and no rash or irritation. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars AN ECO FRIENDLY SWITCH
reviews.reviewText: Struggled to find a long-lasting deodorant that was both eco-friendly and functional. This kind does a good job keep me smelling good until the end of the day and lasts during my walks and workouts. I don't personally love the eucalyptus smell on my skin and will be buying a different smell next time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am so pleased with this product
reviews.reviewText: It is so effective, smells wonderful and lasts for days!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does not have baking soda!! It’s a great product and just as described. A little dab smoothed under each arm and I’m good for the day I have the lavender and I really like the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent at blocking odor and my pits feel healthy!
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell of this deodorant, and it does a great job at stopping odor. It also has helped to clear up my pit skin health..usually other deodorants tend to irritate my skin but this has seemed to help clear up my previous issues! Really appreciate that I recognize all the ingredients..no weird chemicals. Love it and will be ordering again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells great but the smell dissolves quickly
reviews.reviewText: I loved how smooth the paste was and the scent of the vanilla coconut was delightful! However, the scent would wear off quickly and I noticed my sweat more. So sadly, it does not work very long-term.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I started this year hoping to make some changes in the products I use to feel less like garbage about being under the tyranny of capitalism, and, yes, I see the humor of saying that on friggin AMAZON, but living in a small town in rural Appalachia, you have to accept that the convenience of access is just not there anymore outside of places that deliver to you.But this isn't about that, this is about this deodorant. Let me be honest. Personally, I like it. I spend pretty much every waking moment hotter than (insert folksy comparison of choice), but sweating is natural and fine and I wasn't looking for an antiperspirant, just something that'd last for 12+ hours and still smell alright at the end, which this succeeds,The... bad part. I work in a prison. Low security little camp out a few hours from home, and I travel out there a week at a time. Monday comes, I roll up to work, get myself together in my room in the barracks, smear on some of this stuff, throw on my uniform, and head in. Hanging out with another officer, inmate comes over, starts asking a question, gets distracted, asks if either me or the other officer are using bengay. And then it hits me. This deodorant smells straight up like bengay. And I suddenly realize the scent is SO strong and there would be no way to get through a work week using it without hearing a bunch of stupid comments. Anyway, I'm a baby and I went to the dollar store and grabbed some cheap crap deodorant that I hate comparatively, but!! I use this at home pretty often.It does smell super strong which is probably usually a good thing, because I am 110% sure I did not smell like armpit at all when using it. Only thing I don't love is that it is a thick cream that I have applied using a little dollop with my bare hands, and rawdogging this stuff leaves my hands... greasy? I dunno, I always have to wash them after, which is fine, but less convenient than some alternatives. Other than me being a wimp and the greasy thing, this stuff rules for me. Wife doesn't think it works as well for her, but she has a more physically demanding job, so maybe consider how intense a product you need. Sitting in an unconditioned room with a single fan for twelve hours hot sweat, this stuff works great. Handling animals and spending 2/3s of a day walking outside hot, maybe look for something stronger. All bods are different, but this was a win for me.
